name: Final Embrace Horror
prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 15 AND @int_score >= 3 AND (@race:naga OR @race:serpentfolk OR @ability:constrict) AND @feat:final_embrace AND @bab >= 6
descriptionText: Your constricting attack has become stronger and more lethal.
benefitText: A creature that takes damage from your constrict attack is also shaken until the start of your next turn.
